hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select transcode as Serial_type,termid as Device_Id ,transdate as Operate_Date,transtime as Operate_time, (cardaftbal-cardbefbal) as Op_Fee,cardaftbal as out_balance,cardcnt as trade_count from ykt_cur.v_transdtl where transdate>=:startDate and not (transdate>:endDate) and cardno=:cardno and status='3' and not transcode=2141 and not transcode=2142 and not transcode=2143 and not transcode=3081 and not transcode=3082 and not transcode=3083 and not transcode=3090 and not transcode=3091 and not transcode=3092 and not transcode=3000 and not transcode=3010 and not transcode=3020 and not transcode=3030 and not transcode=3040 and not transcode=3050 and not transcode=3060 and not transcode=3070 order by cardno desc,transdate desc,cardcnt desc

select count(*) count from ykt_cur.v_transdtl where transdate>=:startDate and not (transdate>:endDate) and cardno=:cardno and status='3' and not transcode=2141 and not transcode=2142 and not transcode=2143 and not transcode=3081 and not transcode=3082 and not transcode=3083 and not transcode=3090 and not transcode=3091 and not transcode=3092 and not transcode=3000 and not transcode=3010 and not transcode=3020 and not transcode=3030 and not transcode=3040 and not transcode=3050 and not transcode=3060 and not transcode=3070

select DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_NAME,TX_DATE, TX_TIME, CARD_NO, TX_MARK from( select dev.DEVICE_ID, dev.DEVICE_NAME,door.TX_DATE, door.TX_TIME, door.CARD_NO, door.TX_MARK from YKT_CUR.T_DOOR_TXDTL door,YKT_CUR.T_PIF_DEVICE dev where door.device_id=dev.DEVICE_ID and tx_date>=:startDate and not(tx_date>:endDate) and card_no in (:cardNo) union all select dev.DEVICE_ID, dev.DEVICE_NAME,door.TX_DATE, door.TX_TIME, door.CARD_NO, door.TX_MARK from YKT_HIS.T_DOOR_TXDTL_HIS door,YKT_CUR.T_PIF_DEVICE dev where door.device_id=dev.DEVICE_ID and tx_date>=:startDate and not(tx_date>:endDate) and card_no in (:cardNo)) t order by tx_date,tx_time

select count(*) count from( select dev.DEVICE_ID, door.TX_DATE, door.TX_TIME, door.CARD_NO, door.TX_MARK from YKT_CUR.T_DOOR_TXDTL door,YKT_CUR.T_PIF_DEVICE dev where door.device_id=dev.DEVICE_ID and tx_date>=:startDate and not(tx_date>:endDate) and card_no in (:cardNo) union all select dev.DEVICE_ID, door.TX_DATE, door.TX_TIME, door.CARD_NO, door.TX_MARK from YKT_HIS.T_DOOR_TXDTL_HIS door,YKT_CUR.T_PIF_DEVICE dev where door.device_id=dev.DEVICE_ID and tx_date>=:startDate and not(tx_date>:endDate) and card_no in (:cardNo)) t

select cust_id, cut_name,stuemp_no, att_date,count(*) attnum from( select att.cust_id, cust.cut_name,cust.stuemp_no, att.att_date from ykt_ck.t_attserial att left join ykt_cur.t_cif_customer cust on att.cust_id=cust.cut_id where cust.stuemp_no=:stuempNo and att.att_date>=:startDate and not (att.att_date>:endDate) union all select att.cust_id, cust.cut_name,cust.stuemp_no, att.att_date from ykt_ck.t_attserial_record att left join ykt_cur.t_cif_customer cust on att.cust_id=cust.cut_id where cust.stuemp_no=:stuempNo and att.att_date>=:startDate and not (att.att_date>:endDate) )t group by cust_id, cut_name,stuemp_no, att_date order by att_date

select count(*) count from( select cust_id, cut_name,stuemp_no, att_date,count(*) attnum from( select att.cust_id, cust.cut_name,cust.stuemp_no, att.att_date from ykt_ck.t_attserial att left join ykt_cur.t_cif_customer cust on att.cust_id=cust.cut_id where cust.stuemp_no=:stuempNo and att.att_date>=:startDate and not (att.att_date>:endDate) union all select att.cust_id, cust.cut_name,cust.stuemp_no, att.att_date from ykt_ck.t_attserial_record att left join ykt_cur.t_cif_customer cust on att.cust_id=cust.cut_id where cust.stuemp_no=:stuempNo and att.att_date>=:startDate and not (att.att_date>:endDate) )t group by cust_id, cut_name,stuemp_no, att_date order by att_date )s
select count(*) count from ykt_cur.t_tif_tradeserial log where log.operate_date>= :startDate and not(log.operate_date > :endDate) and log.card_id = :cardId and log.serial_state = 2
select EMSG from YKT_CUR.T_PIF_ERRCODE where substr(char(ECODE),1,2)='39' and substr(char(ECODE),3,length(ECODE))=:code

select accdate balance_date ,sum(decode(itemid,5,itemval,0)) open , sum(decode(itemid,6,itemval,0)) receive , sum(decode(itemid,8,itemval,0))lose , sum(decode(itemid,10,itemval,0))cool from YKT_CUR.T_RPTSYSSTAT where itemid in (5,6,8,10) and accdate>=:begindate and not (accdate >:enddate ) group by accdate order by accdate

select substr(accdate,1,6) accdate,sum(decode(itemid,5,itemval,0)) open , select substr(accdate,1,6) balance_date ,sum(decode(itemid,5,itemval,0)) open , sum(decode(itemid,6,itemval,0)) receive , sum(decode(itemid,8,itemval,0))lose , sum(decode(itemid,10,itemval,0))cool from YKT_CUR.T_RPTSYSSTAT where itemid in (5,6,8,10) and substr(accdate,1,6)>=:begindate and not (substr(accdate,1,6) >:enddate ) group by substr(accdate,1,6) order by substr(accdate,1,6)

select count(t.cardno) cardnum,p.cardtypename cardtypename,d.deptname deptname from ykt_cur.t_card t ,ykt_cur.t_cardtype p,ykt_cur.t_customer c ,ykt_cur.t_dept d where t.cardtype = p.cardtype and c.custid = t.custid and c.deptcode = d.deptcode and t.status='1' and d.deptcode=:deptcode group by d.deptname,p.cardtypename

select accdate balance_date,sum(terminalnum)transfer,sum(cashnum)cash,sum(businum)pos from(select accdate,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)cashnum,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)cashamt,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112102 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)ss,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112102 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)dd,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112101 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt) outlaynum,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112101 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt) outlayamt,
(case when transtype=201 and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)centernum,
(case when transtype=201 and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)centeramt,
(case when transtype=202 and subjno=2005 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)businum,
(case when transtype=202 and subjno=2005 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)busiamt,
(case when transtype=204 and subjno=1002 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)terminalnum,
(case when transtype=204 and subjno=1002 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)terminalamt from ykt_cur.t_rptsubjledger where accdate>=:begindate and not(accdate>:enddate)) t group by accdate order by accdate

select substr(accdate,1,6) balance_date,sum(terminalnum)transfer,sum(cashnum)cash,sum(businum)pos from(select accdate,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)cashnum,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)cashamt,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112102 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)ss,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112102 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)dd,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112101 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt) outlaynum,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112101 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt) outlayamt,
(case when transtype=201 and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)centernum,
(case when transtype=201 and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)centeramt,
(case when transtype=202 and subjno=2005 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)businum,
(case when transtype=202 and subjno=2005 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)busiamt,
(case when transtype=204 and subjno=1002 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)terminalnum,
(case when transtype=204 and subjno=1002 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)terminalamt from ykt_cur.t_rptsubjledger where substr(accdate,1,6)>=:begindate and not(substr(accdate,1,6)>:enddate)) t group by substr(accdate,1,6) order by substr(accdate,1,6)

select accdate balance_date,sum(terminalamt)transfer,sum(cashamt)cash,sum(busiamt)pos,sum(outlayamt)outlay,sum(dd)ticket from(select accdate,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)cashnum,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)cashamt,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112102 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)ss,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112102 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)dd,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112101 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt) outlaynum,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112101 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt) outlayamt,
(case when transtype=201 and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)centernum,
(case when transtype=201 and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)centeramt,
(case when transtype=202 and subjno=2005 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)businum,
(case when transtype=202 and subjno=2005 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)busiamt,
(case when transtype=204 and subjno=1002 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)terminalnum,
(case when transtype=204 and subjno=1002 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)terminalamt from ykt_cur.t_rptsubjledger where accdate>=:begindate and not(accdate>:enddate)) t group by accdate order by accdate

select substr(accdate,1,6) balance_date,sum(terminalamt)transfer,sum(cashamt)cash,sum(busiamt)pos,sum(outlayamt)outlay,sum(dd)ticket from(select accdate,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)cashnum,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)cashamt,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112102 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)ss,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112102 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)dd,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112101 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt) outlaynum,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112101 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt) outlayamt,
(case when transtype=201 and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)centernum,
(case when transtype=201 and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)centeramt,
(case when transtype=202 and subjno=2005 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)businum,
(case when transtype=202 and subjno=2005 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)busiamt,
(case when transtype=204 and subjno=1002 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)terminalnum,
(case when transtype=204 and subjno=1002 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)terminalamt from ykt_cur.t_rptsubjledger where substr(accdate,1,6)>=:begindate and not(substr(accdate,1,6)>:enddate)) t group by substr(accdate,1,6) order by substr(accdate,1,6)

select accdate balance_date,sum(terminalamt)transferamt,sum(cashamt)cashamt,sum(busiamt)posamt, sum(outlayamt)outlayamt,sum(dd)ticketamt,sum(terminalnum)transfernum,sum(cashnum)cashnum,sum(businum)posnum from(select accdate,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)cashnum,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)cashamt,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112102 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)ss,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112102 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)dd,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112101 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt) outlaynum,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112101 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt) outlayamt,
(case when transtype=201 and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)centernum,
(case when transtype=201 and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)centeramt,
(case when transtype=202 and subjno=2005 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)businum,
(case when transtype=202 and subjno=2005 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)busiamt,
(case when transtype=204 and subjno=1002 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)terminalnum,
(case when transtype=204 and subjno=1002 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)terminalamt from ykt_cur.t_rptsubjledger where accdate>=:begindate and not(accdate>:enddate)) t group by accdate order by accdate

select substr(accdate,1,6) balance_date,sum(terminalamt)transferamt,sum(cashamt)cashamt,sum(busiamt)posamt, sum(outlayamt)outlayamt,sum(dd)ticketamt,sum(terminalnum)transfernum,sum(cashnum)cashnum,sum(businum)posnum from(select accdate,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)cashnum,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)cashamt,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112102 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)ss,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112102 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)dd,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112101 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt) outlaynum,
(case when transtype in(201,202,261) and subjno=112101 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt) outlayamt,
(case when transtype=201 and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)centernum,
(case when transtype=201 and subjno=1001 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)centeramt,
(case when transtype=202 and subjno=2005 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)businum,
(case when transtype=202 and subjno=2005 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)busiamt,
(case when transtype=204 and subjno=1002 then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)terminalnum,
(case when transtype=204 and subjno=1002 then 1 else 0 end)*(dramt)terminalamt from ykt_cur.t_rptsubjledger where substr(accdate,1,6)>=:begindate and not(substr(accdate,1,6)>:enddate)) t group by substr(accdate,1,6) order by substr(accdate,1,6)

select transdate,transtime,custid,custname,cardno,cardcnt,cardbefbal,cardaftbal,amount,TRANSNAME from ykt_cur.v_transdtl v,ykt_cur.t_transcode c where v.transcode = c.transcode and custid=:custid and transdate>=:begindate and not (transdate >:enddate)

select accdate balance_date,sum(saveamt) saving,sum(conamt) consume,sum(yjamt) ensure from( select accdate, (case when subjno in(2001) and transtype in(201,202,203,204) then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)savecnt, (case when subjno in(2001) and transtype in(201,202,203,204) then 1 else 0 end)*(cramt)saveamt, (case when subjno in(2004) and transtype in(232) then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)concnt, (case when subjno in(2004) and transtype in(232) then 1 else 0 end)*(cramt)conamt, (case when subjno in(6004) and transtype in(604) then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)dhfcnt, (case when subjno in(6004) and transtype in(604) then 1 else 0 end)*(cramt)dhfamt, (case when subjno in(6005) and transtype in(601,602) then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)yjcnt, (case when subjno in(6005) and transtype in(601,602) then 1 else 0 end)*(cramt)yjamt from ykt_cur.t_rptsubjledger where accdate>=:begindate and not accdate>:enddate)t group by accdate order by accdate

select substr(accdate,1,6) balance_date,sum(saveamt) saving,sum(conamt) consume,sum(yjamt) ensure from( select substr(accdate,1,6) accdate, (case when subjno in(2001) and transtype in(201,202,203,204) then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)savecnt, (case when subjno in(2001) and transtype in(201,202,203,204) then 1 else 0 end)*(cramt)saveamt, (case when subjno in(2004) and transtype in(232) then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)concnt, (case when subjno in(2004) and transtype in(232) then 1 else 0 end)*(cramt)conamt, (case when subjno in(6004) and transtype in(604) then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)dhfcnt, (case when subjno in(6004) and transtype in(604) then 1 else 0 end)*(cramt)dhfamt, (case when subjno in(6005) and transtype in(601,602) then 1 else 0 end)*(transcnt)yjcnt, (case when subjno in(6005) and transtype in(601,602) then 1 else 0 end)*(cramt)yjamt from ykt_cur.t_rptsubjledger where substr(accdate,1,6)>=:begindate and not substr(accdate,1,6)>:enddate)t group by substr(accdate,1,6) order by substr(accdate,1,6)

select a.accdate balance_date,a.tottransnum account,b.transcnt inaccount, (case when b.transcnt>0 then (a.tottransnum / (a.tottransnum + b.transcnt))* 100 else 100 end) rate from (select t.accdate,count(t.custid)tottransnum from ykt_cur.v_transdtl t where (t.transcode=3170 or t.transcode=3171) and t.accdate>=:begindate and not t.accdate>:enddate group by t.accdate )a left join (select t.accdate,count(t.custid)TRANSCNT from ykt_cur.v_transdtl t where (t.transcode=3175) and t.accdate>=:begindate and not t.accdate>:enddate group by t.accdate )b on a.accdate=b.accdate order by balance_date

select a.accdate balance_date,a.tottransnum account,b.transcnt inaccount, (case when b.transcnt>0 then (a.tottransnum / (a.tottransnum + b.transcnt))* 100 else 100 end) rate from (select substr(t.accdate,1,6) as accdate,count(t.custid)tottransnum from ykt_cur.v_transdtl t where (t.transcode=3170 or t.transcode=3171) and t.accdate>=:begindate and not t.accdate>:enddate group by substr(t.accdate,1,6) ) a left join (select substr(t.accdate,1,6) as accdate,count(t.custid)TRANSCNT from ykt_cur.v_transdtl t where (t.transcode=3175) and t.accdate>=:begindate and not t.accdate>:enddate group by substr(t.accdate,1,6) ) b on a.accdate=b.accdate order by balance_date

select accdate devid, '' devname, num, money from (select accdate,sum(transcnt) num,sum(cramt) money from ykt_cur.t_rptsubjledger where subjno=2001 and transtype =:seritype and accdate>=:begindate and not accdate>:enddate group by accdate) order by devid

select accdate devid, '' devname, num, money from (select substr(accdate,1,6),sum(transcnt) num,sum(cramt) money from ykt_cur.t_rptsubjledger where subjno=2001 and transtype =:seritype and substr(accdate,1,6)>=:begindate and not substr(accdate,1,6)>:enddate group by substr(accdate,1,6)) order by devid

select balance_date,sum(hdamt) hdamt,sum(flamt) flamt,sum(zjamt) zjamt, sum(hdnum) hdnum,sum(flnum) flnum,sum(zjnum) zjnum from ( select balance_date, (case when MAINDEVICE_ID in (2,155) then 1 else 0 end)*HAPPEN_AMT hdamt, (case when MAINDEVICE_ID in (171) then 1 else 0 end)*HAPPEN_AMT flamt, (case when MAINDEVICE_ID in (428) then 1 else 0 end)*HAPPEN_AMT zjamt, (case when MAINDEVICE_ID in (2,155) then 1 else 0 end)*HAPPEN_NUM hdnum, (case when MAINDEVICE_ID in (171) then 1 else 0 end)*HAPPEN_NUM flnum, (case when MAINDEVICE_ID in (428) then 1 else 0 end)*HAPPEN_NUM zjnum from YKT_CUR.T_TIF_REPORT_OPER where seri_type=930034 and balance_date>=:begindate and not (balance_date>:enddate))t group by balance_date order by balance_date

select substr(BALANCE_DATE,1,6) balance_date,sum(hdamt) hdamt,sum(flamt) flamt,sum(zjamt) zjamt, sum(hdnum) hdnum,sum(flnum) flnum,sum(zjnum) zjnum from ( select substr(BALANCE_DATE,1,6) as balance_date, (case when MAINDEVICE_ID in (2,155) then 1 else 0 end)*HAPPEN_AMT hdamt, (case when MAINDEVICE_ID in (171) then 1 else 0 end)*HAPPEN_AMT flamt, (case when MAINDEVICE_ID in (428) then 1 else 0 end)*HAPPEN_AMT zjamt, (case when MAINDEVICE_ID in (2,155) then 1 else 0 end)*HAPPEN_NUM hdnum, (case when MAINDEVICE_ID in (171) then 1 else 0 end)*HAPPEN_NUM flnum, (case when MAINDEVICE_ID in (428) then 1 else 0 end)*HAPPEN_NUM zjnum from YKT_CUR.T_TIF_REPORT_OPER where seri_type=930034 and substr(BALANCE_DATE,1,6)>=:begindate and not (substr(BALANCE_DATE,1,6)>:enddate))t group by substr(BALANCE_DATE,1,6) order by substr(BALANCE_DATE,1,6)

select rpt.accdate balance_date,rpt.cramt tradefee from ykt_cur.t_rptposledger rpt left join ykt_cur.v_device dev on rpt.deviceid=dev.deviceid where rpt.accdate>=:begindate and not rpt.accdate>:enddate and dev.devphyid=:posid order by rpt.accdate desc

select substr(rpt.accdate,1,6) balance_date,sum(rpt.cramt) tradefee from ykt_cur.t_rptposledger rpt left join ykt_cur.v_device dev on rpt.deviceid=dev.deviceid where substr(rpt.accdate,1,6)>=:begindate and not substr(rpt.accdate,1,6)>:enddate and dev.devphyid=:posid group by substr(rpt.accdate,1,6) order by substr(rpt.accdate,1,6) desc

select rpt.accdate balance_date,sum(rpt.transamt)tradeamt,sum(rpt.rakeoffamt)mngamt from ykt_cur.t_rptshoprakeoff rpt where rpt.accdate>=:begindate and not rpt.accdate>:enddate group by rpt.accdate order by rpt.accdate desc

select substr(rpt.accdate,1,6) balance_date,sum(rpt.transamt)tradeamt,sum(rpt.rakeoffamt)mngamt from ykt_cur.t_rptshoprakeoff rpt where substr(rpt.accdate,1,6)>=:begindate and not substr(rpt.accdate,1,6)>:enddate group by substr(rpt.accdate,1,6) order by substr(rpt.accdate,1,6) desc

select rpt.accdate balance_date,rpt.transcnt tradenum,rpt.transamt tradeamt,rpt.rakeoffamt mngamt,rpt.amount totalamt from ykt_cur.t_rptshoprakeoff rpt left join ykt_cur.t_shop shop on rpt.shopid=shop.shopid where rpt.shopid=:shopid and rpt.accdate>=:begindate and not rpt.accdate>:endate order by rpt.accdate desc

select rpt.accdate balance_date,rpt.transcnt tradenum,rpt.transamt tradeamt,rpt.rakeoffamt mngamt,rpt.amount totalamt from ykt_cur.t_rptshoprakeoff rpt left join ykt_cur.t_shop shop on rpt.shopid=shop.shopid where rpt.shopid=:shopid and substr(rpt.accdate,1,6)>=:begindate and not substr(rpt.accdate,1,6)>:endate order by rpt.accdate desc

select photodate photo_date,count(*)photonum from ykt_cur.t_photo where photodate is not null or not photodate='' and photodate>=:begindate and not photodate>:enddate group by photodate order by photodate desc

select substr(photodate,1,6) photo_date,count(*)photonum from ykt_cur.t_photo where photodate is not null or not photodate='' and substr(photodate,1,6)>=:begindate and not substr(photodate,1,6)>:enddate group by substr(photodate,1,6) order by substr(photodate,1,6) desc

select photodate photo_date,sum(photonum)photonum from (select photodate,(case when cust.custtype =:cuttype then 1 else 0 end) photonum from ykt_cur.t_photo photo inner join ykt_cur.t_customer cust on cust.custid=photo.custid where photo.photodate is not null and not photo.photodate='' and photo.photodate>=:begindate and not photo.photodate>:enddate)t group by photodate order by photodate desc

select substr(photo.photodate,1,6) photo_date,sum(photonum)photonum from (select photodate,(case when cust.custtype =:cuttype then 1 else 0 end) photonum from ykt_cur.t_photo photo inner join ykt_cur.t_customer cust on cust.custid=photo.custid where photo.photodate is not null and not photo.photodate='' and substr(photo.photodate,1,6)>=:begindate and not substr(photo.photodate,1,6)>:enddate)t group by substr(photo.photodate,1,6) order by (photo.photodate,1,6) desc
